Text: I just love Mahjongg.  Now that I have it downloaded, which file do I put it in to play it.  I am using Window Vista Basic Home.
May be a silly question but going to ask anyway, is this the cracked version or the bought one??

Hi :) I just downloaded this and it comes up as wanting to burn an image... very confused.

How do I make this play as a game?

Thankyou...

its an ISO people. It has to be burned to a cd or run in a cd rom emulator like Deamon tools.  If it asks to burn it to a cd, then Burn it to a cd.  when its done, just install and run from that burned cd.  
hope that helps.
